name: Goblin Settlers (Demo)
description:
Goblin Settlers is a demo of a strategy game inspired by old Settlers games (Settlers 2-4) with goblins as settlers. 

As a player you assign build orders and jobs, the goblins do the rest. There is no direct unit control (like in the earlier Settlers games) and this is just a small demo that was created in one month by one developer so you have a few objectives (basically build all "higher" tier buildings) and that is all. 

This is not a full game but just the first level or a vertical slice of what it could be if more time was invested. The game uses Unreal Engine 4 and is available for Windows PCs only.
